sourcesContent:
import { getCacheSheet } from 'images/textures'
import { AnimatedSprite, Spritesheet } from 'pixi.js'

export default class ThrusterSprite extends AnimatedSprite {

	public readonly level: number
	public readonly type: number

	private moving: boolean = false
	
    constructor(x: number, y: number, level: number, scale: number) {
		let type = 1
		if (level >= 4) type = 2
		if (level >= 7) type = 3

		const key = `thruster-${type}-s`
		const sheet = getCacheSheet(key) as Spritesheet
        super(sheet.animations["thrusters"])

		this.anchor.set(0.5, 0)
		this.x = x
		this.y = y
		this.scale.x = scale
		this.scale.y = scale

		this.animationSpeed = 0.2

		this.level = level
		this.type = type

		this.play()

		// Change animation after first loop
		this.onLoop = () => {
			if (this.moving) return

			console.log('Engines started')

			const key = `thruster-${type}-m`
			const sheet = getCacheSheet(key) as Spritesheet
			this.textures = sheet.animations["thrusters"]
			this.play()

			this.moving = true
		}
    }

}
